#summary example junit TestCase usage
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

Once your configuration is complete ([SampleConfiguration]) you just need to instanciate the class and run `checkArchitecture`


= Complete example =

{{{
import junit.framework.TestCase;
import com.nereson.architecturerules.*;


public class ArchitecturalRulesTest extends TestCase {


    public ArchitecturalRulesTest(String name) {
        super(name);
    }


    public void test() {


        ArchitectureTestService architectureTestService = new ArchitectureTestService();

        try {

            architectureTestService.checkArchitecture();

        } catch (CyclicRedundencyException e) {

            fail("cyclic redundency exists: " + e.getMessage());

        } catch (DependencyConstraintException e) {

            fail("dependency constraint violated: " + e.getMessage());

        } catch (SourceNotFoundException e) {

            fail("required source directory not found: " + e.getMessage());
            
        } catch (NoPackagesFoundException e) {
            
            fail("no packages found in the given sources: " + e.getMessage());
        }
    }
}}}}
